title: Different sulfidized procedures and sulfur precursors alter the bacterial toxicity of sulfidized nanoscale zero-valent iron by affecting the physicochemical properties
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00899A, Paper
Haoxuan Zhang, Long Li, Haoran Dong, Shuangjie Xiao, Junmin Deng, Daofen Huang, Junyang Xiao
Different sulfidized procedures and sulfur precursors influenced the bacterial toxicity of S-NZVI and the mechanisms.
